name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: myfaveTT - download all TikToks you've loved

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiktok downloader to export all your Likes, Favorites, and Follows to MP4s for safekeeping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome-extension works when you visit www.tiktok.com on desktop. You can pick a local folder and download: 
  1. all your "Liked" videos,
  2. all your "Favorite" videos,
  2. all videos from someone you follow
and the folder will stay in sync with TikTok.
